content: @Michael Ilewicz that's quite a list of questions! (especially for late Friday afternoon ...) This might better (i.e., more efficient / productive) to schedule an agenda slot on one of our Devices on FHIR calls where you can ask the questions and we can reply. OR you can send them out in priority order here and see how far we get. Let us know what works best
@Todd Cooper I think this would be great! When do these calls take place?
Every Monday at 0600 U.S. Pacific is the Devices on FHIR call that would directly focus on these kinds of topics.
that sounds great. Where does the call take place?
go to the HL7 Devices home page to see the upcoming meetings + subscribe to the Devices on FHIR email list.
